Review.Contenu: EXTREME CAUTION - hidden below the page fold on their website is the reality that the price is not what you will pay. I was charged an additional £74.33 after purchase as they are not a UK company and there will be important duties.

The "iPad POS Enclosure Fixed Stand - Axis Kiosk" I bought is different from the one shown on the website, it does not have a locking hole to lock the cable, but the one on the website has a locking hole.I hope I can exchange the item.

Review.Titre: Computer not safe unless super glue is used
Review.Contenu: The lock works, but the part of the lock device attached to the computer will only stick firmly enough with super glue. If you don't do this, your computer could be easily stolen.  If the lock came with super glue i'd give it a four or a five.

Review.Titre: I love your products, shipping is nuts though.
Review.Contenu: I love your products, but I think it’s crazy that I ordered a tiny piece of metal (I changed MacBook Pro models, so I needed a new metal clip thing) and the shipping cost as much as the metal clip.

Review.Titre: Product was on back order and no one…
Review.Contenu: Product was on back order and no one notified me.  Had to wait a month to get it
Fedex Canada is going to slap you with a customs fee as large as the cost of the item itself :-(

Review.Titre: You didn't include any mounting screws
Review.Contenu: You didn't include any mounting screws, anchors or bolts to use in attaching it to different surfaces or other arms.
Our company is in a rural area and we have trouble with delivery all the time.Maclocks made sure our stuff got to us!

Review.Titre: Good product that filled our needs with…
Review.Contenu: Good product that filled our needs with a helpful customer service.
It's a great product. We hope it has prevented potential MacBook thefts as they are used at Best Buy.

I failed to look through the packing material for ALL the parts and thought one was missing.John took the time to walk me through the process in places where the instructions were vague, ensuring the product was working as expected.Solid product and would recommend!

Review.Titre: Ordering from Maclocks was an easy…
Review.Contenu: Ordering from Maclocks was an easy process as I used their website and the support from their staff was outstanding.

Best customer service I have experienced in a long time. Even on a small dollar amount item they treated me like I was a preferred customer, everytime. I have made several purchases from Maclocks and will continue to do so.

I ordered a Maclock from Amazon several months ago. When I received it, I couldn't set the combination. I reached out, and Maclocks kindly agreed to send me another lock. Unfortunately, this happened three more times. I simply couldn't reset the combination code! Finally, support agreed to set the lock for me and sent it to me since i obviously wasn't capable. This was top notch customer service, and they went above and beyond to make sure I was happy. I received my lock, and it works just as wanted. Thank you especially to Paulina.

I have had the assistance of Nimo on a few choices with product procurement and user information.  He has been extremely helpful and knowledgeable.  His expertise helped our company make the decision to go with your product and we are very happy that we did.

Review.Titre: They are very quick to fill orders
Review.Contenu: They are very quick to fill orders. If something is backordered, they communicate well and even try to find you a similar product. I have filled many purchases with them and they have been an awesome company to work with!

Review.Titre: Very helpful service with delivery to…
Review.Contenu: Very helpful service with delivery to hotel and fast shipping. These are the best option for adding a lock port to a MacBook Pro (this purchase for 14" MBP). The combination lock included is a nice design and quality, but has very little contrast on the numbers to use the combination...

Review.Titre: Good follow through on delayed items
Review.Contenu: I ordered 5 of a particular product and only 3 were available.  I was told that immediately and asked if I wanted to receive the 3 or wait until all 5 were available.  I was given a date for the delayed items and they arrived even sooner than scheduled.  Good work!  Thank you.

Great prices and fast shipping.  High quality, durable product.  It was shipped same day it was ordered.  It took 1 week to go from California to Ontario, Canada by ground.It was nice to not have to buy an entire new stand.  I purchased a new enclosure for an existing stand.  I would definitely recommend Maclocks!

I like it!  The Blade by Maclocks is brilliant!  My laptop has no slot for a computer lock and The Blade is a perfect solution.  Attached easily, is invisible till I need it, and the cable and combination lock are really well-made.  I can recommend it highly.

Review.Titre: Emailing customer service was quick and…
Review.Contenu: Emailing customer service was quick and responsive.  My order did not ship right away, but I was able to get expedited shipping to still get my order quickly.

Good anchor point - seems to hold well. Had to do a bit of surgery on my protective case to make it fit, but I think that would be an issue with any security device.  The lock is a bit quirky to attach to the anchor, but I’m sure I’ll get the hang of it. Sad that Apple won’t make a built-in security slot for a $1,500 iPad!
All responses were timely, product received is of high quality and regular shipping updates were very helpful.  Looks like it will fill our needs nicely.

I received a part that did not properly fit my Mac and contacted their support staff. Paulina responded quickly and sent me a replacement part, keeping me informed and sending me the tracking number of the shipment. Recommended.

Review.Titre: Quality product and fast order to delivery
Review.Contenu: Placing the order and payment process went smoothly.  The product was received quicker then I thought.  Was notified about the delivery. The product was quality and exactly what the website described.

Review.Titre: It took two tries to get the correct…
Review.Contenu: It took two tries to get the correct attachment but everyone was great to work with.  My return processed and the correct lock attachment did get ordered the 2nd time.

Review.Titre: Nimo provides fantastic support and knowledge
Review.Contenu: I really appreciate the quick and accurate responses I received from Nimo.  He is very knowledgably on the products which helped make my purchasing experience very easy.  Much appreciate and look forward to working with him on my next purchase.

I have ordered multiple products at different quantities. Every purchase was successfully processed. They have accomodated my requests to key multiple products the same, and their support is incredible!Nimo and Paulina have always been phenomenal support for all of my questions regarding their products.

Rep. Nimo Dahan was very helpful and was able to assist me with my questions and concerns. I was able to purchase an iPad enclosure and was very happy with my purchase. Placed my order on 3/3/2023 and received it on 3/13/2023.

Paulina is so helpful. Every time I have a question about an order or how something works, she is quick to respond and very thorough.The stands I've ordered have all been very secure and look nice in a display. Maclocks is by far the best place to get any sort of lockable stand.
Great product, customer service was responsive and kept me updated on order status, offered options. Would def purchase again in the future.
The Customer service was awesome . I am a business man myself and they treated me as well as I treat my customers. very unusual to say the least...Nothing but Good will...
Fast, easy, efficient. THANK YOU. No problems whatsoever, great product as advertised, using with kensington locks as we speak.

Excellent product. Would have been nice to come with directions for setup but not needed since it was pretty easy to figure out. We had to bend the prong inside a bit for the iPad to fit and the stand to close and lock properly (although it said it would fit this iPad).
Service went above and beyond, I am very impressed! I also shared your website to my group on Facebook, Jamf School Admins. Hopefully it will help you get more business.
Paulina did a great job answering all my questions. She was helpful and courteous, and gave me confidence in my purchase. Thank you so much Paulina!
Maclocks sells quality products and has provided great service when we needed it. I would recommend ordering from them!
Nimo was extremely quick to understand and handle my questions, as well as streamline the process for me going forward. Very helpful

Review.Titre: This is the second time we've used…
Review.Contenu: This is the second time we've used Maclocks for our iPad bars in our dental practices. They look great, work great, and deliver everything promised
A little more expensive than some others I have seen online, but worth it to get the customer service. Highly recommend them.

Review.Titre: Didnt receive all of my product-…
Review.Contenu: Didnt receive all of my product- reached out to customer service and no one responded
Quick and easy service. I found exactly what I needed and the lock worked with our unit perfectly! Definitely will be ordering more

Review.Titre: I ordered the wrong lock by mistake
Review.Contenu: I ordered the wrong lock by mistake They took care of it and are sending me the correct lock for my 2019 MacBook Pro Great customer service
This piece of equipment is built well and has better functionality than any other iPad holder!
Fantastic service, easy purchase, delivery, and the product works!! Who an ask for more. Thank you!
Product description was accurate. Product was easy to assemble. Arrived in a timely fashion.
Lock didn’t fit my new MacBook so they’re sending me a different lock.

Review.Titre: My MacBook Pro is Safe and secure
Review.Contenu: My MacBook Pro is Safe and secure! No other locking cable can compare. Thank you, Mackocks!
Fabulous customer support, great products, very pleased my laptops are well protected!

Review.Titre: Maclocks is an excellent company with…
Review.Contenu: Maclocks is an excellent company with excellent service. Their goal is to keep the customer happy.

Review.Titre: Exactly what I was looking for
Review.Contenu: Exactly what I was looking for.  Fast, easy process. Product was easy to assemble and of very high quality.
Very happy with the service. Maclocks kept me well apprised with the progress of my order.
Fast Shipping, Order was processed fast. Quick response to question prior to ordering.
Great product. Fast shipment. Clear instructions. Easy to assemble. Thank you

Review.Titre: The chat feature helped me easily…
Review.Contenu: The chat feature helped me easily answer my product questions.

Review.Titre: Perfect mobile device lock for office use!
Review.Contenu: The lock itself looks nice, sturdy and well-functioned. Easy to install.

Review.Titre: Delivered on time and as adveritsed
Review.Contenu: The product works as advertised. Looks good in the location we placed it.

Review.Titre: Perfect POS case for the ipad mini.
Review.Contenu: Perfect POS case for the ipad mini.Easy to order quick delivery.
It was exactly as advertised and exactly what I was looking for.

Review.Titre: Product was exactly what I was looking…
Review.Contenu: Product was exactly what I was looking for. Quick delivery

Review.Titre: always great to work with Maclocks
Review.Contenu: always great to work with Maclocks, they have everything we need!
customer service was great. Products work very well!

Review.Titre: received product on time and as…
Review.Contenu: received product on time and as advertised.

Review.Titre: Thanks Nemo for the pricing support
Review.Contenu: Thanks Nemo for the pricing support. You are awesome

Review.Titre: Delivered quickly and very good quality…
Review.Contenu: Delivered quickly and very good quality and weight to the stand.
Lock arrived as planned and now fits the new 2021 MBP laptop like a champ!
We purchased all locks for our Apple products from from maclocks,. great vendor.
Great product will definitely keep our Ipad safe
Very professional and responsive. Excellent communication. Would do business again. (and again). Thank you.
Great Service.  prompt delivery, tracking information provided, quality of product.
Great customer service and great product.
I ordered a computer stand.  The product was good and arrived on time.
Spectacular Communication!Customer service team communicated every step of the way and it was greatly appreciated.

Review.Titre: The website was easy to use
Review.Contenu: The website was easy to use, I was able to find the product that I needed at a reasonable price. The shipping time was quick. Thank you for an easy shopping experience.

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy and delivery fast.
Was great to make business with you…
Review.Contenu: Was great to make business with you guys.
Great product, fit my galaxy A8 perfectly!

Review.Titre: Fast shipping easy to use site.

Review.Contenu: Good product. quick service.
Great Product!
